sqlCriteria.querySql: select A.*, B.*, E.* FROM TRADE A left outer join itemex E on E.num_iid = A.num_iid left outer join tradeex B on A.tid=B.tid
sqlCriteria.countSql: select count(1) FROM TRADE A left outer join itemex E on E.num_iid = A.num_iid left outer join tradeex B on A.tid=B.tid
select count(1) from trade where Trade_Type=8
select count(1) from trade where status=3 and Trade_Type=8

sqlCriteria.querySql: select * from trade where status=3 and buyer_message is not NULL
sqlCriteria.countSql: select count(1) from trade where status=3 and buyer_message is not NULL

sqlCriteria.querySql: select * from trade where status=3 and Trade_Type=8 and buyer_message is not NULL
sqlCriteria.countSql: select count(1) from trade where Trade_Type=8 and buyer_message is not NULL

sqlCriteria.querySql: select * from trade where status=3 and buyer_message is NULL
sqlCriteria.countSql: select count(1) from trade where status=3 and buyer_message is NULL

sqlCriteria.querySql: select * from trade where status=3 and Trade_Type=8 and buyer_message is NULL
sqlCriteria.countSql: select count(1) from trade where Trade_Type=8 and buyer_message is NULL

sqlCriteria.querySql: select * from trade where status=4 and Trade_Type=8
sqlCriteria.countSql: select count(1) from trade where status=4 and Trade_Type=8

sqlCriteria.countSql: select count(1) from trade where status=6 and Trade_Type=8
